msIdentifier.institution: Royal Asiatic Society of Great Britain and Ireland

author.persName: Muḥammad Ṣādiq Marwazī, known as Wāqaʼiʻ-nigār

msItem.title: Tārīkh-i Jahān'ārā
تاریخ جهان آرا
msItem.note: Volume 2. Folio one, recto: Presented by Col Montieth Decr 4. 1830. The manuscript is uniform with that of the first volume, Codrington/Reade No 154. In Morley's catalogues the two are in the natural order, but in Codrington they have become reversed. Both of them have pasted inside the front cover the notice from Morley's printed catalogue referring to the other volume. A history of the Qajars, from the origin of the family to the end of AH 1233. Vol. II, gpoing up to 1221 Headings in red.
msItem.incipit: Al-hamdu lillahi rabbi 'l-'alimin hamd u sipas u sitayish

bindingDesc.p: Dark leather binding, presumably Persian, with blind-tooled border and green stamped cartouches. Covers loose.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
